Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.navigation

Class CentralNavigationComponent

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.navigation.CentralNavigationComponent
public class CentralNavigationComponent extends Object
The CentralNavigationComponent unites functionality concerned with routing. This includes switching the routes of vehicles or calculating distances / costs of routes.

  • Constructor Details

    • CentralNavigationComponent

      public CentralNavigationComponent(AmbassadorParameter ambassadorParameter, @Nonnull CApplicationAmbassador.CRoutingByType navigationConfiguration, @Nonnull CPublicTransportRouting publicTransportConfiguration)
      Constructor for the CentralNavigationComponent. Sets the logger and the configuration for navigation.
      Parameters:
      ambassadorParameter - The ApplicationAmbassadorParameter. These include the parameters for the CentralNavigationComponent.
      navigationConfiguration - The routing configuration.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(RtiAmbassador rtiAmbassador) throws InternalFederateException
      This method initializes the CentralNavigationComponent. It is called by the ApplicationAmbassador. The vehicleRouting will be created and initialized and other simulators will be informed using a VehicleRoutesInitialization interaction.
      Parameters:
      rtiAmbassador - the ambassador of the run time infrastructure
      Throws:
      InternalFederateException - if the vehicleRouting couldn't be initialized or the VehicleRoutesInitialization interaction couldn't be send to the rti

    • close

      public void close()

    • getAllRoutes

      public Map<String,VehicleRoute> getAllRoutes()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of all routes known to the SimulationKernel.
      Returns:
      unmodifiable view of all routes known to the SimulationKernel

    • switchRoute

      public VehicleRoute switchRoute(VehicleData vehicleData, CandidateRoute rawRoute, VehicleRoute currentRoute, long time) throws IllegalRouteException
      Switch to a specific route.
      Parameters:
      rawRoute - A CandidateRoute, which the vehicle might change to.
      vehicleData - The VehicleData of the vehicle, which is going to switch routes.
      time - Time at which the route change should happen.
      Throws:
      IllegalRouteException

    • createAndPropagateRoute

      public VehicleRoute createAndPropagateRoute(CandidateRoute rawRoute, long time) throws IllegalRouteException
      Creates a VehicleRoute from a CandidateRoute and propagates it to all ambassadors by triggering a VehicleRouteRegistration.
      Parameters:
      rawRoute - The raw route object.
      time - The current simulation time. Used when sending the VehicleRouteRegistration.
      Throws:
      IllegalRouteException

    • getSourcePositionOfRoute

      public GeoPoint getSourcePositionOfRoute(String routeId)
      Get the source position of a route for a specific route ID.
      Parameters:
      routeId - The id of the route, that the source position is wanted of.
      Returns:
      GeoPoint-target of the given route, null if route doesn't exist.

    • getRouting

      public VehicleRouting getRouting()
      Provides the current routing API implementation.
      Returns:
      The VehicleRouting.

    • createRouteForOdInfo

      public VehicleDeparture createRouteForOdInfo(long time, OriginDestinationPair odInfo, VehicleDeparture departure)
      This method tries to create a route for an OriginDestinationPair. If the OriginDestinationPair contains a valid route, that route is used for the VehicleDeparture. Otherwise, a route will be generated and checked. If that created route is valid it will be used for the VehicleDeparture.
      Parameters:
      time - Time of propagation message
      odInfo - The OriginDestinationPair, that a route should be created for.
      departure - Prior departure information read from configuration.
      Returns:
      A VehicleDeparture if a valid route was found, otherwise null.

    • refineRoadPosition

      public IRoadPosition refineRoadPosition(IRoadPosition roadPosition)
      This method refines the road position depending on the implementation of the VehicleRouting interface this can have different levels of complexity.
      Parameters:
      roadPosition - the IRoadPosition to be refined
      Returns:
      the refined IRoadPosition

    • refineRoute

      public VehicleRoute refineRoute(VehicleRoute route)
      This method completes a route definition if it is missing either a list of node ids or connection ids, but provides the other.
      Parameters:
      route - the potentially incomplete VehicleRoute
      Returns:
      the completed VehicleRoute with list of node ids and connection ids

    • approximateCosts

      public Collection<CandidateRoute> approximateCosts(Collection<CandidateRoute> candidateRoutes, String lastNodeId)
      Approximates the costs for all CandidateRoutes passed to the function.
      Parameters:
      candidateRoutes - A collection of CandidateRoutes
      lastNodeId - The ID of the Node last passed
      Returns:
      A new collection of CandidateRoutes wit approximated costs.
